Mission.item1: Founded in 2006, Dogon Consulting operates in the industry to help companies during the transformation of their Finance function.
Mission.item2: Dogon’s DNA is characterized by a dual competence: Industrial Management / long-term Project Controlling / Finance and SAP expertise.
Mission.item3: Our services are offered in French, English and German.

Stakes.item1: The speeding up of mergers and acquisitions, the evolution of local and international accounting standards (IFRS 15, 16,17) require the fast and agile transformation of the Finance Function.
Stakes.item2: Digitalization projects are used to reach the goals set by the General Management.
Stakes.item3: Our SAP expertise combined with our experience in Operational Controlling and Accounting guarantee a perfect understanding of your needs and that they will be taken into account in the SAP implementation (CO/PS/FI/BI modules / integration with logistics)
Stakes.item4: The diversity of our experiences notably in Pharmaceuticals, Food industry and Aeronautics in MTS, MTO, ATO, CTO and ETO environments allows us to deal with the complexity of your projects.
Stakes.item5: We intervene in transversal flows that require a global approach.
Stakes.item6: Our interventions constitute a bridge between financial expertise and Information Systems.

ManagementConsulting.title: Management Consulting and Performance Management
ManagementConsulting.offer: We offer to facilitate Strategy implementation and to improve Performance Management by harmonising, simplifying and ensuring the accuracy of the following processes:
ManagementConsulting.bullet1: Creation of the Strategic Plan and Budget, Forecasts,
ManagementConsulting.bullet2: Review of Operational Processes and their impacts on Accounting and Controlling (local and IFRS standards),
ManagementConsulting.bullet3: Management of the monthly and yearly financial closings,
ManagementConsulting.bullet4: Reporting, help with decision-making and performance measurement (KPI’s and KRI’s), balanced scorecards,
ManagementConsulting.bullet5: Outsourcing of the Controlling and Accounting functions.

Budget.title: Strategic Plan and Budget, Forecasts, Simulations
Budget.item1: The strategic plan embodies the detailed implementation of the strategy and precedes budgeting. We offer to rationalize these processes by limiting manual processing, facilitating the forecasts, simulations and harmonising indicators.
Budget.item2: Our recommendations concern also the calculation of standard costs and transfer prices in their operational, financial and tax dimensions.

Governance.title: Governance, harmonisation of the accounting and operational processes, internal audit
Governance.item1: The cartography of the processes must be created at a relevant granularity level for all the stakeholders.
Governance.item2: A unique repository must be defined to manage the accounting master data (harmonisation of the Chart of Accounts), the controlling and production master data…
Governance.item3: We analyse the transversal processes that are often difficult to master (complex logistic flows: co-products, by-products, scraps, returns, made-to-order with configurator)
Governance.item4: We offer to analyse their impact on stock management and on the profitability of products.
Governance.item5: Our operations aim at highlighting the accounting and tax risks by helping with the creation of reliable accounting records, audit trail and by guaranteeing the control of the inter-companies transactions.
Governance.item6: We recommend the implementation of Best Practices based on both the SAP standards and an empirical approach.

Closing.title: Improving financial closings
Closing.item1: The closing process sets the pace of accounting and controlling activities. However it still involves too much reprocessing.
Closing.item2: Reducing the time spent closing accounts (Fast Close) is as important as the quality of the data that is sent and received.
Closing.item3: We reduce the time required to carry out financial closing and improve its quality through industrialisation:

Reporting.title: Reporting, support to decision-making and performance measurement
Reporting.item1: Performance measurement is based on increasingly complex data and volatile environments.
Reporting.item2: Management controllers and accountants must focus on analysis and not on the collection or reprocessing of data.
Reporting.bullet1: Collecting and ensuring the accuracy of data necessary for the creation of reports. We recommend the use of a range of tools in order to verify the integrity of the master data,
Reporting.bullet2: Defining financial reports, the documentation and the choice of indicators: revenue recognition, margins, WIP, Accruals, EBIT…
Reporting.bullet3: Anticipating the changes necessary in order to meet new IFRS 15&16&17 requirements, the OECD recommendations: BEPS (Base Erosion and Profit Shifting) and CBCR (Country By Country Reporting)
Reporting.bullet4: Offering tools which are suitable in terms of cost, complexity and appropriation by the user.

Outsourcing.title: Outsourcing of accounting and controlling functions
Outsourcing.item1: Our services consist in providing you with assistance in the accounting and controlling function:
Outsourcing.bullet2: Temporary replacement of a team member.

SAPConsulting.title: Consulting and SAP Integration
SAPConsulting.offer: Dogon’s dual competence is essential in order to :
SAPConsulting.bullet1: Guarantee the elicitation of business requirements, mastering the interdependence between modules,
SAPConsulting.bullet2: Fully understand the interdependencies between modules,
SAPConsulting.bullet3: Guarantee the comprehensiveness of the scope of the project,
SAPConsulting.bullet4: Use SAP advanced functions rather than developing specific programs

Audit.title: Functional audit of SAP solutions
Audit.item1: We analyse processes and implement tools such as BPML (Business Process Master List) in SAP in order to facilitate these analysis in compliance with Internal Audit requirements.
Audit.item2: We offer a review of the master data that have a financial impact.
Audit.item3: We analyse the relevance of customising and we advise on the replacement of bespoke programs by SAP standard solutions.
Audit.item4: We work alongside you to consider the relevance of upgrades, the integration of new modules or products, while insisting on simplicity and pragmatism.

SAPExpertise.title: SAP Functional Expertise
SAPExpertise.item1: Dogon Consulting offers interventions on roadblocks or consulting on critical or transversal issues during all the phases of a project, for instance:
SAPExpertise.bullet1: Explaining the advanced functions of margin smoothing in PS,
SAPExpertise.bullet2: Automatically integrating long-term planning results in the CO module from APO and/or PP,
SAPExpertise.bullet3: Managing budget cycles thanks to relevant tools (EPM/ECC)
SAPExpertise.bullet4: Offering advanced functions for the calculation of standard costs, evaluating and explaining the calculation of industrial variances with or without material ledger,
SAPExpertise.bullet5: Making the processes more reliable notably through the implementation of SAP inter-module control and reconciliation programs (FI/CO-PA, FI/MM…),
SAPExpertise.bullet6: Obtaining a summary of the activity thanks to the creation of a P&L budgeted by product family in the CO-PA module.

Deployment.title: Deployment (FI/CO/PS/BI modules)
Deployment.item1: We are able to intervene during all the phases of the project as a CO/PS/FI consultant or Integration Manager (in charge of the transversal flows) with FI/SD/MM/PP/PP-PI/CS/BI/PM/APO.
Deployment.item2: For real-time reporting, we offer standard reporting solutions in ECC with the advanced functions of Report Painter/Writer when the most recent modules are not installed.

Training.title: Training
Training.item1: Our services include customised training programs for users of all levels in French, English and German, on site or remotely.
